entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebView loading issue #21870
  • issue running tutorial #21869
  • Android: Image Translations offset Image but not Background or Touchable area #21868
  • Setting PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation does not affect Status Bar Hiding Animation #21866
  • Consider marking INativeBindingService as Obsolete #21861
    .NET 9 Planning
  • DatePicker not respecting UserAppTheme #21858
  • MAUI CollectionView causes to crash app on both IOS and Android #21855
  • Memory leak when using shell navigation on Android #21853
    Backlog
  • When an image is used for a IconImageSource all images are using the theme or a different color than the one originally assigned in the .svg after that #21852

Closed

  • items in flyout are transparent #21865
  • Throwing in a background thread freezes the UI when debugging #21741
  • [WinUI] Crash involving `ObservableCollection` and `ContentView` #21860
  • DesignMode.IsDesignModeEnabled always returns true when in Debug (with Hot Reload enabled?), breaking OrientationStateTrigger #21776
  • [.Net 8] Bindable Properties Initialization with default new() #21831
  • Cannot run Debug build on iOS simulator #21811
  • Switches should have their own options to Color their Thumb and Tint for state On/Off #21817
  • Spurious `XFC0040` errors. #21848
  • How to change the position of Hamburger menu icon - .Net 8 Maui #21854
  • Compile-time binding of BindingContext should use the inherited x:DataType #21434
  • Going back using 'Shell.Current.GoToAsync("..")' causes a crash, but only when using a Mouse on an Android. #19461
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge

Merged

  • [X] Fix TargetType simplification bug #21764
  • [XC] Fix x:DataType resolution for BindingContext #21454
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating back #20420
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, area/gestures
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #21844
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak with CollectionView #21850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [iOS] Fix issue that does not allow scrolling in WebView with PDF #21571
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area/Xaml </>
  • `LayoutHandler.Windows`: Store children to a local variable #21792
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [Trimming] Use new feature switch definition attribute and enable analyzers in Controls.Core.csproj #21621
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, control-titleview
  • fix: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirec… #21797
    area/blazor 🕸️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Allow compat iOS buttons to resize image and to respect spacing and padding #21759
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-refreshview
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests #21840
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [iOS] Fix KeyboardScrolling for controls inside the NavBar #21806
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/keyboard
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [UI Testing] Split mouse and touch Appium actions and added pending ones (TouchAndHold etc) #21305
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button
  • Inheriting Visual States #20467
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [iOS] Frames' content update #20501
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-frame
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-editor
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Android] Navigation bar - left margin fix #20967
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • Add missing Android Systemfonts #21207
    platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨
  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [iOS] FlyoutHeader size change fix #21692
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, control-flyout
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [XC] compile OnIdiom #21799
    area/Xaml </>
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) #21818
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
